DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety IW-9179 patient diabetic gastroparesis ( DGP ) effect treatment cardinal symptom DGP .
DOC.brief_title: Trial IW-9179 Patients With Diabetic Gastroparesis ( DGP )
DOC.criteria: Patient male nonpregnant , nonbreastfeeding female , age 18 year old time Screening Visit . Patient confirm diagnosis type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus . Patient diagnosis DGP history evidence mechanical obstruction , symptom least 3 consecutive month precede Screening Visit , delay gastric empty solid document within 2 year Screening Visit . Patient normal EGD either Screening Period within 2 year Screening Visit , evidence structural organic disease may explain patient 's gastroduodenal symptom . Patient compliant eDiary completion . Patient agree refrain make new , major lifestyle change . Patient fluent literate English . Patient history current symptom organic structural disease , opinion investigator , cause abdominal pain discomfort may confound assessment DGP symptom . Patients rumination syndrome , cyclic vomit syndrome , anorexia nervosa , bulimia . Patient currently use gastric electric stimulator endoscopic pyloric injection botulinum toxin within 6 month prior Screening Visit . Patient hospitalize within 2 month prior Screening Visit uncontrolled diabetes mellitus , DGP , associate malnutrition . Patient report significant diarrhea four week prior Screening Visit , 2 day either week Pretreatment Period . Patient surgery GI tract time Screening Visit , appendectomy cholecystectomy 3 month Screening Visit , nonGI surgery abdomen , pelvis , retroperitoneal structure 6 month , major nonGI surgery 30 day Screening Visit . Patient history cancer ( resect basal cell squamous cell carcinoma skin acceptable ) .
